EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #3 - US - 2014.09.09.Email - Invite 1 - US
EmailTemplate.subject: Agile Webinar Series: Optimize Agile Software Development with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Accelerate and Optimize Agile Software Development with Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Join our webinar to learn how Tosca Testsuite can help your enterprise optimize risk coverage through agile testing practices. The webinar will be presented by Tricentis’ own Roman Zednik, Worldwide Director for Presales Consulting.
The webinar will focus on the following key features:
- Risk Analysis and Coverage Optimization of epics and user stories - Test Automation (GUI and non GUI – API testing) - Integration with Agile Lifecycle Management tools like Rally, VersionOne - How Tosca fits into Continuous Integration
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-3-us-2014-09-09.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Tue Sep 9, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-sales Consulting Tricentis
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
